successes.title: Mars Attacks Occupation Trading Cards
successes.description: Mars Attacks: Occupation is the all-new trading card set based on Topps' infamous and iconic sci-fi series.

Pledges.description:
WATCHING FROM MARS - DIGITAL REWARDS
Receive a PDF copy of the new story cards, and a PDF of an all-new game scenario for Mars Attacks: The Miniatures Game from Mantic Games.

MARTIANS APPROACHING #2 
Receive everything in the Watching From Mars pledge level + 4 packs of Mars Attacks: Occupation, and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details). FREE U.S. SHIPPING

INVASION BEGINS - BASE SET REWARD
Receive everything in the Watching From Mars pledge level + one complete common base set of Mars Attacks: Occupation (does not include any chase cards or super rare "hit" cards), and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

INVASION BEGINS - BASE SET REWARD 
Receive everything in the Watching From Mars pledge level + one complete common base set of Mars Attacks: Occupation (does not include any chase cards or super rare "hit" cards), and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details). FREE U.S. SHIPPING

DESTROY THE CITY - HOBBY BOX REWARD
Receive everything in the Watching From Mars pledge level + one 24-pack hobby box of Mars Attacks: Occupation, and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

DESTROY THE CITY - HOBBY BOX REWARD
Receive everything in the Watching From Mars pledge level + one 24-pack hobby box of Mars Attacks: Occupation, and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

DESTROYING A DOG - BASIC MASTER SET BUNDLE
Receive everything in the Watching from Mars Pledge Level + one base common set of Mars Attacks: Occupation, all chase subsets, one collector binder, and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

DESTROYING A DOG - BASIC MASTER SET BUNDLE
Receive everything in the Watching from Mars Pledge Level + one base common set of Mars Attacks: Occupation, all chase subsets, one collector binder, and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

PRIZE CAPTIVE - MEGA MASTER SET BUNDLE
Your "Sweet Spot" Pledge!  Receive everything in the Watching From Mars pledge level + one 24-Pack Hobby Box of Mars Attacks: Occupation, all chase card subsets, one Collector Binder, one complete Heritage Parallel Set, one complete Foil Parallel Set, and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

PRIZE CAPTIVE - MEGA MASTER SET BUNDLE
Your "Sweet Spot" Pledge!  Receive everything in the Watching From Mars pledge level + one 24-Pack Hobby Box of Mars Attacks: Occupation, all chase card subsets, one Collector Binder, one complete Heritage Parallel Set, one complete Foil Parallel Set, and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

CREEPING MENACE - RETAILER PLEDGE LEVEL 
For certified retailers and dealers ONLY!
Receive everything in the Watching From Mars Pledge Level + one case of 8 Hobby Boxes of Mars Attacks: Occupation plus 4 retailer incentive metal cards (1 design x 4) that are not distributed in packs.  For the purposes of this pledge, to qualify as a retailer you must have EITHER a brick-and-mortar retail store OR a dedicated retail website that has been owned, operating and shipping to customers for at least 3 months.   Any unverified supporters at this level will NOT receive the 4 retailer special Metal Cards!  So do NOT choose this level unless you can prove that you are a currently operating, qualified retailer.  If you would like to check to make sure you qualify, please contact us before the end of the campaign.  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

THE FROST RAY - SUPREME MASTER SET BUNDLE - Receive everything in the Prize Captive pledge level + one Variant Binder with Exclusive Bonus Card, one concept parallel Set, all Letter-Press Super Rare "Hits", one red logo sketch card and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details). FREE U.S. SHIPPING

ORIGINAL ART REWARD - Receive everything in the Prize Captive pledge level + one 8.5x11 original painting by artist Dan Brereton, shown in the graphic below. Please note that the painting will ship upon completion of the campaign.  Cards will follow upon production at the scheduled ship time noted. FREE U.S. SHIPPING

BURNING FLESH - ULTIMATE MASTER SET BUNDLE 
Receive everything in the Frost Ray pledge level + all Metal Super Rares (including 1 each of both case-toppers), one variant (green logo) sketch, one hand-signed Len Brown Metal Autograph Card (Exclusive to this pledge) and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

BURNING FLESH - ULTIMATE MASTER SET BUNDLE 
Receive everything in the Frost Ray pledge level + all Metal Super Rares (including 1 each of both case-toppers), one variant (green logo) sketch, one hand-signed Len Brown Metal Autograph Card (Exclusive to this pledge) and any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

ROBOT RAID - ORIGINAL ART REWARD - Receive everything in the Prize Captive pledge level + one 8.5" x 11" original painting by artist BOB LARKIN, shown in the graphic below. This artwork will be used on a card in Mars Attacks: Occupation tentatively titled "Robot Raid."  Please note that the painting will ship upon completion of the campaign.  Cards will follow upon production at the scheduled ship time noted. FREE U.S. SHIPPING

HELPLESS VICTIM - YOUR FACE ON A CARD!
Become a part of Mars Attacks history!  Receive everything in the Prize Captive pledge level + your likeness will appear as a human victim on a card in the base set of Mars Attacks: Occupation!  Also receive a signed, 1/1 print of the card on which your likeness appears. FREE U.S. SHIPPING

SKYSCRAPER TUMBLES - UNCUT PLATE REWARD - Receive everything in the Burning Flesh Pledge Level + 1 Uncut Printing Plate Sheet (31.5" x 40.5")  - the one-of-a-kind metal production plate used to create the base set - actually used in printing.  There are 4 different colored printing plates used in production to create the front art of the cards.  You will receive the MAGENTA metal printing plate.  Also receive a full uncut sheet of the Mars Attacks: Occupation Base Set.  Will ship flat.

CRUSHING THE MARTIANS - UNCUT PLATE REWARD (YELLOW) - Receive everything in the Burning Flesh Pledge Level + 1 Uncut Printing Plate Sheet (31.5" x 40.5")  - the one-of-a-kind metal production plate used to create the base set - actually used in printing.  There are 4 different colored printing plates used in production to create the front art of the cards.  You will receive the YELLOW metal printing plate.  Also receive a full uncut sheet of the Mars Attacks: Occupation Base Set.  Will ship flat.

EARTHMEN CHARGE - UNCUT PLATE REWARD (CYAN) - Receive everything in the Burning Flesh Pledge Level + 1 Uncut Printing Plate Sheet (31.5" x 40.5")  - the one-of-a-kind metal production plate used to create the base set - actually used in printing.  There are 4 different colored printing plates used in production to create the front art of the cards.  You will receive the CYAN metal printing plate.  Also receive a full uncut sheet of the Mars Attacks: Occupation Base Set.  Will ship flat.

DEATH IN THE COCKPIT - UNCUT PLATE REWARD (BLACK) - Receive everything in the Burning Flesh Pledge Level + 1 Uncut Printing Plate Sheet (31.5" x 40.5")  - the one-of-a-kind metal production plate used to create the base set - actually used in printing.  There are 4 different colored printing plates used in production to create the front art of the cards.  You will receive the BLACK metal printing plate.  Also receive a full uncut sheet of the Mars Attacks: Occupation Base Set.  Will ship flat.

EARTH, OCCUPIED - ORIGINAL ART REWARD - Receive everything in the Prize Captive pledge level + one 8.5" x 11" original painting by artist BOB LARKIN, shown in the graphic below. This is the artwork to be used for CARD #1 in Mars Attacks: Occupation, tentatively titled "Earth, Occupied!"  Please note that the painting will ship upon completion of the campaign.  Cards will follow upon production at the scheduled ship time noted. FREE U.S. SHIPPING

DINOSAUR HUNTER - DINOSAURS ATTACK SKETCH MASTER SET
Receive everything in the Burning Flesh pledge level + one Dinosaurs Attack sketch card from each artist contributing to this DA sketch set (minimum 35), a 1-of-1 Gold Edition of the Dinosaurs Attack Metal Card, plus a 1-of-1 Exclusive Dinosaurs Attack Creator Autograph Metal Card, plus any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details). FREE U.S. SHIPPING

THE HUMAN TORCH - DESIGN A CARD
Receive everything in the Prize Captive pledge level + work with our art director and one of our freelance superstar artists to design a card that will be featured in the main story for Mars Attacks: Occupation!  Upon completion, youâ€™ll be given a special giclee print of the card signed by the artist!  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

BASIC SKETCH MASTER SET
Receive everything in the Burning Flesh pledge level + one red logo sketch card from each artist contributing to this red logo sketch set, plus any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE U.S. SHIPPING

ROBOT TERROR - CUSTOM PARALLEL SET BUNDLE 
Receive everything in the Burning Flesh pledge level (x3) + receive unique RED FOIL, GREEN FOIL and RAINBOW FOIL parallel base sets of Mars Attacks Occupation, produced JUST FOR YOU!   FREE U.S. SHIPPING

SKETCH OVERLORD SET 
Receive everything in the Burning Flesh pledge level + one red logo sketch card from each artist contributing to the red logo sketch set, one creator sketch card from each contributing creator, one Throwback sketch card, one Dual Artist sketch card PLUS one red logo sketch card from Mick & Matt Glebe, who are only producing ONE sketch for Mars Attacks Occupation-- JUST FOR YOU!  Will also include any applicable stretch goals (see stretch goal infographic below for details).  FREE SHIPPING.
